Texts.Chs: 关于信徒服饰的获取指南
要制作属于你的上衣，你需要将七个诺克石锭、一个密文魔杖和一个远古残卷放入祭坛，然后颂唱Horvalaatsh的咒文。
Texts.Eng: No self-respecting cultist is without his robe. To make your upper garment, you must place 7 Nocxium Bars, 1 Rune Wand and an Elder Fragment upon the altar and recite the incantation of Horvalaatsh.

Texts.Chs: 信徒真正的服饰 - 上衣
